name: Dungeon Rush (itch) (windrunner555)
description:
Dungeon Rush is a 3D dungeon management game set in a capitalistic fantasy world. 

After a series of strikes, you, an unnamed goblin, are the only member left of the Husk Dungeons workforce, and oh, goblin, will it not be easy... Getting to do all the maintenance, defending, and keeping everything in the massive dungeon on track will surely put a spin on your 9 to 5 job! But do not worry! Your salary will not increase either! You were only supposed to be sword fodder as a lowly goblin, which doesn't change much, but you now have to worry about dying and not finishing your tasks. Better use that tiny cave brain to escape the adventurers! Don't worry if you fail, goblins are oh-so-replaceable. 

Patricia Necula- concept, UI & character artist- Artstation

Rebecca Pearce-Davies- concept & environment artist-  Artstation

Matt Burke- 3D environment artist & VFX artist- Artstation

Peter Convery- team leader, programmer & designer- Peterconvery.pc@googlemail.com

Alexander Norris- lead programmer & designer- Website

Keri Hughes- writer

Charlie Ryan- outsourced team logo & voice acting- cjryan2803@gmail.com

Samuel Pearce-Davies- sound designer & computer musician- Website

The build is a placeholder right now; a playtest build will be up shortly! 

Expect the final game on May 20th!
